title: Umbraculidae
text:
Umbraculidae are a <a href="Taxonomy%20%28biology%29">taxonomic</a> <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> of unusual <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>s or <a href="limpet">limpet</a>s, <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="opistobranch">opistobranch</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusc">mollusc</a>s in the <a href="clade">clade</a> <a href="Umbraculida">Umbraculida</a>.
Distribution.
This family has a global distribution in <a href="tropical">tropical</a> and <a href="subtropical">subtropical</a> seas.
Genera.
Genera within the family Umbraculidae include:
